sql.content: SELECT A.workID ,A.workFatherID ,A.flowTemplateID ,A.serviceDataID ,A.createrID ,A.creater ,A.createOrgID ,A.createOrg ,A.createTime ,A.lastUserID ,A.lastUser ,A.lastTime ,A.lastOrgID ,A.lastOrg ,A.lastProcessID ,A.isValid ,A.isDelete FROM TFlowInfo A WHERE A.flowTemplateID = ':flowTemplateID' ORDER BY A.lastTime DESC

SELECT A.workID ,A.workFatherID ,A.flowTemplateID ,A.serviceDataID ,A.createrID ,A.creater ,A.createOrgID ,A.createOrg ,A.createTime ,A.lastUserID ,A.lastUser ,A.lastTime ,A.lastOrgID ,A.lastOrg ,A.lastProcessID ,A.isValid ,A.isDelete FROM TFlowInfo A <[ WHERE A.serviceDataID = ':serviceDataID' ]> <[ WHERE A.workID = ':workID' ]> UNION SELECT A.workID ,A.workFatherID ,A.flowTemplateID ,A.serviceDataID ,A.createrID ,A.creater ,A.createOrgID ,A.createOrg ,A.createTime ,A.lastUserID ,A.lastUser ,A.lastTime ,A.lastOrgID ,A.lastOrg ,A.lastProcessID ,A.isValid ,A.isDelete FROM TFlowInfo_History A <[ WHERE A.serviceDataID = ':serviceDataID' ]> <[ WHERE A.workID = ':workID' ]>

UPDATE TFlowInfo SET lastTime = ':process.operateTime.fullMilli' ,lastUserID = ':process.operateUserID' ,lastUser = ':process.operateUser' ,lastOrgID = ':process.operateOrgID' ,lastOrg = ':process.operateOrg' ,lastProcessID = ':process.processID' <[ WHERE serviceDataID = ':process.serviceDataID' ]> <[ WHERE workID = ':process.workID' ]>

INSERT INTO TFlowInfo_History ( workID ,workFatherID ,flowTemplateID ,serviceDataID ,createrID ,creater ,createOrgID ,createOrg ,createTime ,lastUserID ,lastUser ,lastTime ,lastOrgID ,lastOrg ,lastProcessID ,isValid ,isDelete ) SELECT A.workID ,A.workFatherID ,A.flowTemplateID ,A.serviceDataID ,A.createrID ,A.creater ,A.createOrgID ,A.createOrg ,A.createTime ,A.lastUserID ,A.lastUser ,A.lastTime ,A.lastOrgID ,A.lastOrg ,A.lastProcessID ,A.isValid ,A.isDelete FROM TFlowInfo A <[ WHERE A.serviceDataID = ':serviceDataID' ]> <[ WHERE A.workID = ':workID' ]>
DELETE TFlowInfo <[ WHERE serviceDataID = ':serviceDataID' ]> <[ WHERE workID = ':workID' ]>
DELETE FROM TFlowInfo <[ WHERE serviceDataID = ':serviceDataID' ]> <[ WHERE workID = ':workID' ]>
